statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.DepartmentName , AA.ParentID , AA.UseYn , AA.ManagerID
, BB.EmployeeName aa ManagerName
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BCDepartmentHist AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.BCEmployee BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ManagerID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.DepartmentName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.DepartmentName , AA.ParentID , AA.UseYn , AA.ManagerID
, BB.EmployeeName aa ManagerName
FROM dbo.BCDepartmentHist AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.BCEmployee BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ManagerID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BCDepartmentHist ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, DepartmentName, ParentID, UseYn, ManagerID, StartDate, EndDate ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #DepartmentName#, #ParentID#, #UseYn#, #ManagerID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BCDepartmentHist SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, DepartmentName = #DepartmentName# , ParentID = #ParentID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , ManagerID = #ManagerID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
